overview: Chronicling a trip to Japan made by a small group of friends, this enviro-social documentary aims to question our dependence on technology these days and its affects on future outdoor and social engagement.
tagline: Overwhelmed with the hyper-connectivity of the modern world, a group of friends embark on a journey to Japan in search of powder snow on a quest to find and experience the ever-fabled “moment”.
title: Tamashii
